sentences.en: This policy of disengagement from the European war had its critics.
sentences.cn: 从欧战中逐渐撤军的政策遭到了批评。

sentences.en: Exaggerated claims merely fuel public distrust and disengagement.
sentences.cn: 夸大其词只会加剧公众的不信任和疏离。

sentences.en: The Israeli Prime Minister put forward the disengagement plan in 2003.
sentences.cn: 以色列总理在2003年提出了撤离计划。
